column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday March 3 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Richmond Rd at Old Richmond Rd:
column4: All outbound lanes shutdown due to an injury collision.  Traffic diverted to Old Richmond Rd toward Delong Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Richmond Rd at Old Richmond Rd:
column4: Inbound traffic on Old Richmond Rd diverted to Aphids Way toward Athens Boonesboro Rd.
